title: unlocked a skin and cant use it
body: I recently upgraded a tpa shen skin to permanent and it is not in my account. What do I do ?

replies.body:
Heya, I looked into this for you!  I do see that you unlocked Shen the champion today.  

I don't see any history of the skin or shard on your account or hextech though.
Sorry It wasn't a tpa it was an SSW Here is a link of my purchase history with it in there https://imgur.com/a/uBlsi
